text: tatha jab ve eemaan vaalon se milate hain, to kahate hain ki ham bhee eemaan laaye aur jab ekaant mein aapas mein ek-doosare se milate hain, to kahate hain ki tum unhen vo baaten kyon bataate ho, jo allaah ne tumapar kholee[1] hain? isalie ki pralay ke din tumhaare paalanahaar ke paas ise tumhaare virudhd pramaan banaayen? kya tum samajhate nahin ho
